title: Introduction to Computer Science
description: A foundational course covering the basics of computer science, algorithms, and programming concepts.

chapters.title: Introduction to Programming
chapters.description: Basic concepts of programming and computational thinking.

chapters.title: Data Types and Variables
chapters.description: Understanding different data types and how to use variables.

chapters.title: Control Structures
chapters.description: Conditional statements and loops in programming.

chapters.title: Functions and Procedures
chapters.description: Creating reusable code with functions and procedures.
